alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:18AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Monterey County through 845 AM PST... At 818 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Seaside, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Seaside, Monterey, Marina, Pacific Grove, Carmel-By-The-Sea, Castroville, Prunedale, Del Monte Forest, Boronda, Del Rey Oaks, Sand City and Elkhorn. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 73 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
